speaker: doctor
text: Yo sit down, my guy. You look like you got packet loss.

speaker: player
text: Dude I swear my brain’s running on 12 FPS. I saw something in the hallway.

speaker: doctor
text: Alright speedrun me the details. When did the mental servers start acting up?

speaker: player
text: Like three days ago? I blinked and there was a shadow NPC doing a t-pose.

speaker: doctor
text: Bro you’re entering nightmare mode. Are you overclocking your anxiety or what?

speaker: player
text: Sleep is for background processes. I’ve been having pressure on hardcore mode.

speaker: doctor
text: I'll run diagnostics before your brain bluescreens and starts speaking in binary.

speaker: player
text: Respect. You’re the only support class in this bugged-out dungeon I call life.

speaker: doctor
text: Stay hydrated, remember to hit me up before your brain ragequits again.
